S06sspp2_3u:0_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhūt: kīdṛgrūpāḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:1_0: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:1_1: māyopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā māyopamā me devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:1_2: nirmitopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā nirmitopamā me devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:1_3: te naiva kiṃcic chroṣyanti na sākṣātkariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:2_0: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:2_1: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā,
S06sspp2_3u:2_2: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad devaputrā evam etad,
S06sspp2_3u:3_1: māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā,
S06sspp2_3u:3_2: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:5_3: jihvāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, kāyo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:11_0: avidyāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, saṃskārā api svapnopamā māyopamāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:11_6: tṛṣṇāpi svapnopamā māyopamā, upādānam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:16_0: atha te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:16_1: bodhir api subhūte svapnopamā māyopamā vadasi.
S06sspp2_3u:16_2: tat kiṃ nirvāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadasi?
S06sspp2_3u:17_0: subhūtir āha: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadāmi,
S06sspp2_3u:17_1: sacet tato nirvāṇād anyaḥ kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataro bhavet,
S06sspp2_3u:17_2: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyam.
S06sspp2_3u:17_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_3u:18_2: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputraḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:18_3: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo 'nekāni ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim evam āhuḥ:
S06sspp2_3u:18_4: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃpraṇītāyāḥ pratyeṣitāro bhavanti?
S06sspp2_3u:19_0: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakān tāñ ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:19_1_0: avaivartikā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā
S06sspp2_3u:19_1_1: evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā
S06sspp2_3u:19_2_0: dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāś
S06sspp2_3u:19_2_1: ca sattvā bahubuddhakoṭīṣv avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca kulaputrā
S06sspp2_3u:19_2_2: kuladuhitaraś ca ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā
S06sspp2_3u:19_2_3: evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdudṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā

S06sspp2_3u:120_0_0: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇāsyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā
S06sspp2_3u:120_0_1: evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśyāyā evaṃduravabodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā
S06sspp2_3u:120_0_2: evaṃpraṇītāyā [ŚsP_II-3_35] evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā na kecit pratyeṣitāro
S06sspp2_3u:120_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate.
S06sspp2_3u:120_2: yathaivātra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit sattvaḥ pratyeṣitā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_3u:121_0: atha āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:121_1: na tv āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa trīṇi yānāni vyavasthāpyante.
S06sspp2_3u:121_4: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:123_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:123_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:123_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:124_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:124_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:124_6: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:124_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:126_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣman śāradvatīputra evam etat,
S06sspp2_3u:126_1_0: tathā yathā vadasi vistareṇeha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāny upadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:126_1_1: pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha
S06sspp2_3u:126_2: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:128_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:128_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:128_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:129_1: upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:129_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tānīmāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyante,
S06sspp2_3u:129_6: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:129_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:131_0: rūpasyānupalambhayogena, vedanāyā anupalambhayogena, saṃjñāyā anupalambhayogena, saṃskārāṇām anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_3u:142_1: athāyuṣman śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:142_2: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante,
S06sspp2_3u:142_3: anupalambhayogena. kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate.
S06sspp2_3u:142_4: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamacittotpādo bodhimārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:144_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:144_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:144_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:145_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:145_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:145_6: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:145_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:145_15: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanty anupalambhayogena.

S06sspp2_3u:197_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:197_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:198_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:198_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:198_6: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:198_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:198_8: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:198_15: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:199_0: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha [ŚsP_II-3_52] upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,

S06sspp2_3u:203_0: anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:204_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā, bahirdhāśūnyatā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā, mahāśūnyatā, paramārthaśūnyatā, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā, [ŚsP_II-3_53] atyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:205_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:205_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri

S06sspp2_3u:206_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:206_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:206_6: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:206_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:206_8: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:206_15: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:207_0: abhāvaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate.
S06sspp2_3u:207_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:209_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, [ŚsP_II-3_54] catvāry āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_3u:209_1: catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:210_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:210_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:210_7: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:210_8: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:210_9: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:210_16: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:211_0: svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate.
S06sspp2_3u:211_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:213_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:213_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:213_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:214_2: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:214_6: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:214_7: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:214_8: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:214_9: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:214_16: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:215_0: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:217_0_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:217_0_1: pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ, catvāry āryasatyāni, catvāri
S06sspp2_3u:217_0_2: dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:218_1: evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:218_5: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi [ŚsP_II-3_56] kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:218_6: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:218_7: sa na kadācid ācchetsyate, yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:218_8: sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:218_15: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:220_1: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
S06sspp2_3u:220_2_0: asyāḥ sarvadharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yan nv ahaṃ puṣyāṇy abhinirmāya
S06sspp2_3u:220_2_1: buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca mahāsattvān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthaviram
S06sspp2_3u:220_2_2: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avakireyam abhyavakireyam abhiprākireyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_0: yāvantaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau cāturmahārājikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_1: yāmā devās tuṣitā devāḥ nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_2: devā brahmapurohitā devā brāhmaparṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_3: devā apramāṇābhā devāḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parittaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_4: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatpharā devā
S06sspp2_3u:220_3_5: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devā sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣām etad abhūvan:
S06sspp2_3u:220_5: yaṃ nūnaṃ vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthavirañ cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avikireyam.
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro ye trisāhasramahāsāḥsre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_1: devāḥ trāyastriṃśā devāḥ yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_3: ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhasvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_4: devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhākṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_5: devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_6: devās te sarve divyāni māndāravāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś
S06sspp2_3u:221_0_7: ca mahāsattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca suhūtisthaviram asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe
S06sspp2_3u:221_1: abhyavakiranti sma, abhiprākiranti sma, mahāvarṇakaiś ca taiḥ puṣpaiḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:221_3: upariṣṭhād aṃtarīkṣe trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ pramāṇaḥ puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:222_1: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā [ŚsP_II-3_58] sarvadevabhavaneṣv adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pravaramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_3u:222_2: yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:222_3: na staṃbhaniryātāni na sthalajāni na jalajāni yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayānīmāni puṣpāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:223_0: atha śakro devānām indraḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:224_0: subhūtir āha: yat punaḥ kauśika evaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_3u:224_1: aniryātānīmāni puṣpāṇi nemāni puṣpāṇi manoniryātāni na stambhaniryātāni,
S06sspp2_3u:225_0: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte, imāny eva puṣpāṇy aniryātāni,
S06sspp2_3u:225_1: atha rūpam apy anirjātam evaṃ vedanāpy aniyātā saṃjñāpy aniryātā saṃskārā apy aniryātā vijñānam apy aniryātam.
S06sspp2_3u:226_0: subhūtir āha: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi, na kauśikemāny eva puṣpāny aniryātānīti,
S06sspp2_3u:226_1: rūpam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:226_2: vedanāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:226_3: saṃjñāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_3u:226_4: saṃskārā api kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:226_5: vijñānam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_3u:227_0: cakṣuḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:227_1: śrotraṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:227_2: ghrāṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:227_3: jihvā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_3u:227_4: kāyaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:227_5: manaḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:228_0: rūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:228_1: śabdaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:228_2: gandhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:228_3: rasaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:228_4: sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:228_5: dharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:229_0: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:229_1: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:229_2: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:229_3: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:229_4: kāyavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:229_5: [ŚsP_II-3_59] manovijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_3u:230_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:230_1: śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:230_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:230_3: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:230_4: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na saḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:230_5: manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tnanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:231_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:231_1: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:231_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:231_3: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:231_4: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:231_5: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā caniryātā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_3u:232_0: pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:232_1: abdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:232_2: tejodhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:232_3: vāyudhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:232_4: ākāśadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:232_5: vijñānadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:233_0: avidyā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā avidyā,
S06sspp2_3u:233_1: saṃskārāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_2: vijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_3: nāmarūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_4: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_5: sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_6: vedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:233_7: tṛṣṇā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_3u:233_8: upādānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_9: bhavaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_10: jātiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:233_11: jarāmaraṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_3u:234_0: dānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:234_1: śīlapāramitā [ŚsP_II-3_60] kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:234_2: kṣāntipāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:234_3: vīryapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:234_4: dhyānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:234_5: prajñāpāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:235_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_1: bahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_2: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_3: śūnyatāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_4: mahāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_5: paramārthaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_6: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_7: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_8: atyantaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_9: anavarāgraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavarāgraśūnyata,
S06sspp2_3u:235_10: anavakāraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_11: prakṛtiśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_12: sarvadharmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_13: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_14: anupalambhaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_15: abhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_16: svabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:235_17: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_3u:236_0: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_1: samyakprahāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_2: ṛddhipādāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_3: indriyāṇi kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:236_4: balāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_5: bodhyaṅgāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_6: āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_7: āryasatyāni kauśikāṃiryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_8: dhyānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_9: apramāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_10: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_11: aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye [ŚsP_II-3_61] cāniryātā na tā aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_12: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_13: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_14: abhijñāḥ kauśikāniryātā yās cāniryātā na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_15: samādhayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_16: dhāraṇīmukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_17: daśatathāgatabalāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_3u:236_18: catvāri vaiśāradyāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni catvāri vaiśāradyāṃi,
S06sspp2_3u:236_19: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_20: mahāmaitrī kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_3u:236_21: mahākaruṇā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_3u:236_22: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_23: srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_24: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_25: anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad anāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_26: arhattvaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad arhattvaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_27: pratyekabodhiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā pratyekabodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_28: mārgākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_3u:236_29: sarvākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_3u:236_30: srotaāpannaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāo na sa srotaāpannaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_31: sakṛdāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sakṛdāgāmī,
S06sspp2_3u:236_32: anāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so anāgāmī,
S06sspp2_3u:236_33: arhat kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so arhat,
S06sspp2_3u:236_34: pratyekabuddhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pratyekabuddhaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_35: bodhisattvaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:236_36: tathāgataḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tathāgataḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:237_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
S06sspp2_3u:237_1: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtisthaviro yatra hi nāma prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāñ copadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:238_0: atha bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate sma:
S06sspp2_3u:238_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etad gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yatra hi nāmaṃ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:239_0: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:239_1: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
S06sspp2_3u:240_1: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:240_2: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:240_3: vedanā kauśika prajñaptimātrā yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:240_4: saṃjñā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:240_5: saṃskārāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:240_6: vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:240_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:240_8: yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:241_0: cakṣuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:241_1: śrotraṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:241_2: ghrāṇaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:241_3: jihvā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:241_4: kāyaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:241_5: manaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:241_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:241_7: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:242_0: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_1: śabdaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_2: gandhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_3: rasaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_4: sparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_5: dharmāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:242_7: yā na rūdhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati [ŚsP_II-3_63] na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:242_8: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_9: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_10: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_11: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_12: kāyavijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_13: manovijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:242_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:242_15: yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:243_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:243_1: śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:243_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:243_3: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:243_4: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:243_5: manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:243_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:243_7: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:244_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_1: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_2: ghrāṇasarnsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_3: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_4: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ [ŚsP_II-3_64] kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_5: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayaveditaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:244_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,

S06sspp2_3u:253_0: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:253_1: evam etat kauśika evam etad, tad yathā pi nāma bhagavatā prajñaptimātraṃ sarvadharmān upadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:253_2: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātraṃ sarvadharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06sspp2_3u:254_0: evaṃ śikṣamānaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:254_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:254_2: vedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:254_3: saṃjñāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa saṃjñāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:254_4: saṃskāreṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa saṃskārān na samanuupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:254_5: vijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati [ŚsP_II-3_69] yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuṣi na śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa cakṣur na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_2: śrotre na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrotraṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_3: ghrāṇe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ghrāṇaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_4: jihvāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa jihvāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_5: kāye na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kāyaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:255_6: manasi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa mano na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:256_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate.

S06sspp2_3u:267_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:267_1: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:277_11: kena kāraṇenāṣṭ;au vimokṣāṃ na samanupaśyati, kena kāraṇena navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:277_16: kena kāraṇena daśa [ŚsP_II-3_76] tathāgatabalāni na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:277_17: kena kāraṇena catvāri vaiśāradyāni na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:277_18: kena kāraṇena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:278_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hi kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:284_1: abdhātur abdhātunā śūnyaḥ, tejodhātuḥ tejodhātunā śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:285_0: avidyā avidyayā śūnyā, saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ, vijñānaṃ [ŚsP_II-3_77] vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:285_1: nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:285_2: sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ, vedanā vedanayā śūnyā, tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇayā śūnyā, upādānam upādānena śūnyaṃ, bhavo bhavena śūnyaḥ, jātir jātyā śūnyā, jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena śūnyam.
S06sspp2_3u:288_3: indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni, balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni, bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_3u:288_6: dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni, apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_3u:288_10: abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ, samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:289_0: na hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā rūpaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:300_0: yaḥ kauśika iha śūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate sa śūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate 'dvaidhīkāreṇa,
S06sspp2_3u:328_1: sa na rūpasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:328_2: na vedanāyā vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:328_3: na saṃjñāyā vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:328_4: na saṃskārāṇāṃ vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:328_5: na vijñānasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:329_0: na cakṣuṣo vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:329_1: na śrotrasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:329_2: na ghrāṇasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:329_3: na jihvāyāṃ vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:329_4: na kāyasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:329_5: na [ŚsP_II-3_88] manaso vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:330_0: na rūpasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:330_1: na śabdasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:330_2: na gandhasya vṛddhaye na hānaye śikṣate,

S06sspp2_3u:393_6: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_8: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na dhyānānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_11: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_13: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_15: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na samādhīnāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_16: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_17: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na tathāgatabalānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_18: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_19: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na pratisaṃvidānāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhāṇāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_20: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mahāmaitryāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_21: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mahākaruṇāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_22: kiṃkāraṇaṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_23: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na srotaāpattiphalasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_24: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_28: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na mārgākārajñatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya,
S06sspp2_3u:393_29: kiṃkāraṇaṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya.
S06sspp2_3u:394_1: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpasya parigraho nāsti,
S06sspp2_3u:402_10: na hi vīryapāramitā vīrya pāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_3u:404_18: tathā hy āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya parigraho nāsti,
S06sspp2_3u:405_0: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaparigrahayogena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06sspp2_3u:406_0: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06sspp2_3u:407_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
S06sspp2_3u:408_0: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāyāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06sspp2_3u:409_0: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:409_1_0: na nirodhaṃ paśyati [ŚsP_II-3_110] nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:409_1_1: paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:409_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:410_0_0: na vedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:410_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:410_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vedanā vedanāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:411_0_0: na saṃjñām utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:411_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:411_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃjñā saṃjñāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:412_0_0: na saṃskārāṇām utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:412_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:412_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:413_0_0: na vijñānasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:413_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:413_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:414_0_0: na cakṣuṣa utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:414_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:414_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuś cakṣuḥsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:415_0_0: na śrotrasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:415_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:415_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śrotraṃ śrotrasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:416_0_0: na ghrāṇasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:416_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:416_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:417_0_0: na jihvāyā utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati [ŚsP_II-3_111] notsargaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:417_0_1: paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:417_0_2: na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati.
S06sspp2_3u:417_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi jihvā jihvāsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:418_0_0: na kāyasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na
S06sspp2_3u:418_0_1: saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:418_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kāyaḥ kāyasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:419_0_0: na manasa utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:419_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:419_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mano manaḥsvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:420_0_0: na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:420_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:420_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:421_0_0: na śabdasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:421_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:421_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śabdaḥ śabdasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:422_0_0: na gandhasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:422_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:422_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi gandho gandhasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:423_0_0: na rasasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:423_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:423_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi raso rasasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:424_0_0: na sparśasyotpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:424_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:424_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sparśaḥ sparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:425_0_0: na dharmāṇām utpādaṃ paśyati, na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati
S06sspp2_3u:425_0_1: na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ
S06sspp2_3u:425_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dharmā dharmasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:426_1: na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati.

S06sspp2_3u:427_1: na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati.

S06sspp2_3u:432_1_1: paśyati [ŚsP_II-3_113] nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ
S06sspp2_3u:432_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_3u:513_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ chāradvatīputram etad avocat:

S06sspp2_3u:514_0: śāradvatīputra āha: prajñāpāramitā devānām indra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ subhūtiparivartā gaveṣitavyā.

S06sspp2_3u:515_1: tavaiṣa bhadanta subhūte 'nubhāvaṃs tavaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yad ārya [ŚsP_II-3_125] śāradvatīputra evam āha,
S06sspp2_3u:516_0: subhūtir āha: na mamaiṣa kauśikānuhāvo na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.

S06sspp2_3u:520_0: subhūtir āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, nānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,

S06sspp2_3u:784_0: anena kauśika paryāyeṇānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:791_1: abdhātvanantatām upādāya, tejodhātvanantatām upādāya, vāyudhātvanantatām upādāya, ākāśadhātvanantatām upādāya, vijñānadhātvanantatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_3u:794_2: ṛddhipādānantatām upādāya, indriyānantatām upādāya, balānantatām upādāya, bodhyaṅgānantatām upādāya, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānantatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_3u:794_3: āryasatyānantatām upādāya, dhyānānantatām upādāya, apramāṇānantatām upādāya, ārūpyasamāpattyanantatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_3u:794_14: mahāmaitryanantatām upādāya, mahākaruṇānantatām upādāya, aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānantatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_3u:795_0: punar aparaṃ kauśikālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:796_0: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte ālambanānantatayānantatapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:797_0: subhūtir āha: sarvākārajñatālambanānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:798_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika dharmālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:799_0: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte dharmālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:800_0: subhūtir āha: dharmadhātvanantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:801_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tathatālambanānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:802_0: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte tathatālambanānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:803_0_0: subhūtir āha: kauśika tathatālambanānantatayā ālambanānantatā ālambanānantatayā tathatānantatā
S06sspp2_3u:804_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
S06sspp2_3u:805_0: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanata subhūte sattvānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:806_0: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika katamasyaitad dharmasyādhivacanaṃ [ŚsP_II-3_215] yad uta sattvaḥ sattva iti.
S06sspp2_3u:807_0_0: śakra āha: nedaṃ bhadanta subhūte dharmādhivacanaṃ nādharmādhivacanam āgantukam etan
S06sspp2_3u:807_0_1: nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptam avastukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptam anārambaṇam etan nāmadheyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:807_0_2: prakṣiptaṃ yad uta sattvaḥ sattva iti.
S06sspp2_3u:808_0: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika kācid iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_3u:809_0: śakra aha: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
S06sspp2_3u:810_0_0: subhūtir āha: yatra kauśika na sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā kācit tatra sattvānantatā sacet
S06sspp2_3u:810_0_1: kauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭha ca sattvaḥ
S06sspp2_3u:810_1: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu tatra kaścit sattva utpadyate vā niruddhyate vā.
S06sspp2_3u:811_0: śakra āha: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte. tat kasya hetoḥ? ādi viśuddhatvā sattvasya.
S06sspp2_3u:812_0: subhūtir āha: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇa sattvānantatyā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_3u:813_0: atha sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakā devāḥ saprajñāpatikā devāḥ sanārīnaragaṇās triskṛtvā udānam udānayati sma,
S06sspp2_3u:813_1_0: aho svākhyāto dharmaḥ aho svākhyāto dharmā aho svākhyāto dharmasya dharmatā yeyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:813_1_1: subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyate yad uta tathāgataprādurbhāvo ya tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhānena
S06sspp2_3u:814_0: api nu tathāgatam eva vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:814_1: yo na yā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:814_2: na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:815_0: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā.

S06sspp2_3u:824_0_2: vā aṣṭau vimokṣā vā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni

S06sspp2_3u:824_0_5: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā mārgākārajñatā vā sarvākārajñatā
S06sspp2_3u:824_2: katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ? yad uta śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya samyaksaṃbuddhayānasya.

S06sspp2_3u:838_0: tathāgata eva sadevaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:839_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni.
S06sspp2_3u:839_2: katamāṇi trīṇi? yad uta śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:843_0: bodhisattvāś ca devaputrā mahāsattvāḥ sarvatrātra dharmeṣu śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:844_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:844_1: śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, mahāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:844_2: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:844_3: anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:844_6: abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:845_0_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu śikṣate, samyakprahāṇeṣu śikṣate, ṛddhipādeṣu śikṣate, indriyeṣu
S06sspp2_3u:845_0_1: śikṣate, baleṣu śikṣate, bodhyaṅgeṣu śikṣate, āryāṣṭāṅgamārge śikṣate, āryasatyeṣu
S06sspp2_3u:845_0_2: śikṣate, dhyāneṣu śikṣate, apramāṇeṣu śikṣate, ārūpyasamāpattiṣu śikṣate, aṣṭau vimokṣeṣu
S06sspp2_3u:845_2_0: abhijñāsu śikṣate, samādhiṣu śikṣate, dhāraṇīmukheṣu śikṣate, tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:845_2_1: vaiśāradyeṣu śikṣate, pratisaṃvitsu śikṣate, mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate, mahākaruṇāyāṃ
S06sspp2_3u:846_0: tasmāt tarhi devaputrās tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vaktavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:847_0: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānike padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāpaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvan,
S06sspp2_3u:849_3: indriyair avirahito 'bhūvan, balair avirahito 'bhūvan, bodhyaṅgair avirahito 'bhūvan,
S06sspp2_3u:850_0: anyair anyaiś cāparimāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito 'bhūvan tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:850_1: tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mānavānāgate 'dhvani bhadrakalpe,
S06sspp2_3u:850_2_0: asminn eva lokadhātāv asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06sspp2_3u:850_2_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ sāstā devānāṃ ca
S06sspp2_3u:851_1: āścarya bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā anuparigrāhikā,
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_0: atha bhagavāṃś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃś
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_1: cāturmahārājakāyikāṃś ca devaputrāṃ trāyastriṃśāṃś ca devaputrān upamāṃś ca devaputrāṃs
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_2: tuṣitāṃś ca devaputrān nirmāṇaratiś ca devaputrāś ca devaputrān paranirmitavaśavartiś
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_3: ca devaputrā brahmakāyikāś ca devaputrā brahmapurohitāṃś ca devaputrān brahmapārṣadyāś
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_4: ca devaputrān mahābrahmāṇaś ca devaputrān ābhāś ca devaputrān parīttābhāṃś ca devaputrān
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_5: apramāṇābhāṃś ca devān ābhāsvarāṃś ca devān śubhāṃś ca devān parīttaśubhāṃś ca devān
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_6: pramāṇaśubhāṃś ca devān śubhakṛtṣṇāṃś ca devān bṛhāś ca devān parīttabṛhāś ca devān
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_7: pramāṇabṛhāṃś ca devān bṛhatphalāṃś ca devān avṛhāś ca devān atapāṃś ca devān sadṛśāś
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_8: ca devān sudarśanāṃś ca devān akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devān saṃnipatitāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇāṃ viditvā
S06sspp2_3u:863_1_9: tān sarvāṃ sākṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śakradevānām indram āmantrayate sma.
S06sspp2_3u:864_0_0: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopasikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_3u:864_0_1: kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:864_0_2: paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:864_2: na teṣāṃ mārapāpīyāṃ mārakāyikā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06sspp2_3u:865_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:865_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:866_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:866_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:867_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā [ŚsP_II-3_224] bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:867_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:868_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣurvijñānasūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:868_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na sūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:869_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:869_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:870_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:870_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:871_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:871_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā [ŚsP_II-3_225] śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:872_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vāvidyāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:872_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:873_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā dānapāramitāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:873_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:874_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā adhyātmaśūnyatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:874_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:875_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:875_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:876_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vāryasatyaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:876_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:877_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatabalaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:877_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:878_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā sarvajñatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:878_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06sspp2_3u:879_0: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ manusyā vāmanuṣyā vāvatāraṃ prekṣāvatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06sspp2_3u:879_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā sarvasattvānām antike [ŚsP_II-3_227] maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsu bhāvitā tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:879_2: na ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamā parihāreṇa kālaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_3u:880_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvā samyakparihāreṇa nopasthitā yo vā kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
S06sspp2_3u:880_1_0: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo
S06sspp2_3u:880_1_1: devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ brahmakāyikā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā
S06sspp2_3u:880_1_2: devā mahābrahmā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devā anuttarāyai
S06sspp2_3u:880_2_0: yaiś ca devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na srutā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā paryavāptā
S06sspp2_3u:880_2_1: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06sspp2_3u:881_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:881_0_1: dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yonisaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahito
S06sspp2_3u:882_0: na khalu punas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vābhyavakāśagatānāṃ cotpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:882_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatāsu bhāvitā tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_3u:883_1_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:883_1_1: devā trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_3u:883_1_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:883_1_3: devās te sarve bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:883_2_0: vayaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06sspp2_3u:883_2_1: saṃvidhāsyāmo ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣante udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:883_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaṃ hi bhagavan mahāsattvam āgamya narakā ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_3u:883_6: yamaloka ucchidyante devadāridyam ucchidyante manuṣyadāridyam ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_3u:883_8: na bhavanti durbhikṣakāntārāḥ sarva ucchidyante bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_3u:887_6: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:887_12: ābhāsvara devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:887_14: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:887_17: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:887_20: abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, [ŚsP_II-3_230] atapā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:888_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaḥ paripākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:889_0: anena ca bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhyatavyā.
S06sspp2_3u:890_0: evam ukte bhagavāṃc chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:890_1: evam etad kauśika evam etad, bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_3u:894_6: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:894_12: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, parītābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, apramāṇābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:894_13: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parītaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:894_16: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parītabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_3u:896_0: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaḥ paripākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:897_0: tasmād bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyāḥ pūjayitavyāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:897_2: mānsa kauśika satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ manyate,
S06sspp2_3u:897_3: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ pūjayitavyaṃ manyet.
S06sspp2_3u:898_0: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayītavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cāsya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā,
S06sspp2_3u:899_0_0: lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇe bhavec chrāvakapratyekabuddhais tad yathā pi nāma naḍavanaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:899_0_1: vā ikṣvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śāravanaṃ vā śārivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā tan kaścid eva
S06sspp2_3u:899_0_2: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yavajjīvaṃ satkuryāt mānayet pūjayet sarvopakaraṇair yaś
S06sspp2_3u:899_0_3: caikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prathamacittotpādikaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:899_0_4: satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayed ayam ayam eva tato bahutato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:899_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na khalu punaḥ kauśika tāṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:900_0: bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśika mahāsattvam āgamya sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddho loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:900_2: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cāsyā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
